name: manufacturing-mcp
description: Natural language interface to your manufacturing database. Supports SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL, and MSSQL.

db_url.title: Database URL
db_url.description: Connection string for your database. Leave empty to use the built-in demo database. Examples: postgresql://user:pass@host:5432/mydb | mysql://user:pass@host:3306/mydb | sqlite:///C:/path/to/your.db
